web.title: Mini for YouTube
web.overview: The Mini for YouTube application displays the website 'http://m.youtube.com/'' in the native BlackBerrybrowser.

web.title: Mini for Facebook
web.overview: The Mini for Facebook application displays the website 'https://touch.facebook.com/' in the native BlackBerry browser.

web.title: Mini for Instagram
web.overview: The Mini for Instagram application displays the website 'https://instagram.com/' in the native BlackBerry browser.
